title: Deadline – U.S.A. (restored, colorized) (1952, film noir, imdb score: 7.2)

sources.title: Deadline – U.S.A. (restored, colorized) (1952, film noir, imdb score: 7.2)
sources.description: Deadline – U.S.A. is a 1952 American film noir crime film and starring Humphrey Bogart , Ethel Barrymore and Kim Hunter , written and directed by Richard Brooks . It is the story of a crusading newspaper editor who exposes a gangster's crimes while trying to keep the paper from going out of business; he is also attempting to reconcile with his ex-wife.
